MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G13 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Yoker Mill Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.28pm. Our engineers have established that there is an underground cable fault and that repairs will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 7.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.41pm on Friday 27th November 2020.
